name: Eternal Repentance
description:
Eternal Repentance is a platformerish action game. It has a strong story element. It was made for Ludum Dare 37.

Controls for the game are

Jump - Z
Shoot - X
Open a door - C
Move - Arrows

Eternal Repentance was made using Unity game engine and Pro Motion Ng. I used freely available Bitstream Vera Sans font (license) in the game.
